ValidationRule.description:
Require a Vendor record be added before moving to stage 4 or beyond, standard opportunities only. Exclude Europe sales roles.
Exceptions made for Sys Admins, API Admins and TSB reps and managers
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( RecordTypeId ="01270000000E0MS", RecordTypeId = $Label.VeritivIQRecordTypeID), $Profile.Id <>"00e70000000swa5", $Profile.Id <> "00e70000000j606", Owner.ProfileId <> "00e5w000001nr5t", Owner.ProfileId <> "00e5w000001xwik", Owner.UserRoleId <> "00E70000000me2D", Owner.UserRoleId <> "00E70000000mexx", Vendor_Count__c = 0, OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "4- Demo/RFQ"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "5- Proposal"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "6-Closing Presentation to Decision Maker"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "7- Verbal Commitment"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "8- Closed Won") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must enter a Vendor Detail record before moving beyond Stage 3.
